data.name: Going the Distance
data.detailed_description:
He was a hero. Your hero. Your older brother Rivus was everything you wanted to be. It was hard after he left to the army. It was harder after he died.

He wouldn't have wanted you to mope in your room forever though. On the long journey to heal and grieve, you've decided to celebrate your memories with him by making paper air planes to explore locations you've spent the most time with him. The house you grew up, the lake where you went camping, the mou-e̵̲̰͙̰̽̎̄r̵͔͚̺̳͕͖͖̋͊̔̑̔̄͌̊̋̽̈́r̴̨͍̝͔̹̰̮̬̠̜̘̘̳͗̔̂̒̔̈́̀͂͗̓̐̄̐ͅǫ̶̨̘͓͓̤̲̠͉̠͈̬̣̫̆̚͜ȑ̷̡͚̤̖̩͉̥̣̣̗̹̪̗́̃̍̐̈́̾̎̑͌̐͐͝͝

the forest w̴̯̥̓̎̓̅̉͊̐͘h̸̢̪͎͚͙͕̍̈́́̇̏̂̓̃͠͠ĕ̸̤̳͈̣̓̎͌͛̎͠r̴̛̝͔̖̰̹͉̥̺̱̼̺̔̐̓͝e̴̛̳͈̖̘̟͚̠̩̼̻͖̽̍͌̎͒͛̓͘̕ͅ ̶̹̫̀͑́h̷̢̢̛̦̠̞̱̹͎̪͖̮̖͎̟̀e̵̡̞̘̗̪̯͓̯̤͍̽̔̓͆̌́̀̾̆̄͑̈͋͜͝ͅ ̴̠͓͚̯͒͐̿̓͌̄͒́͌̿̈́͘ͅd̵̤͋̓̈́̆̄͆̂͂̈́͋i̷̜̜͉͍̬̰̰̟͂̄͊̇͌͑̽͜e̶͖̥̞͕̫͔̖̪̮̗͓͎̰̋̋͋̉̄͂̇̕̕͘͜ḓ̶̡̺̟̻͕̦̜̟͐̒̊̀̓̃̇̄̓͆̚͠.

With Zel, the robot he built for you, to help upgrade your planes, you should be able to go further and farther than ever. Whatever it takes to go the distance and lay your laments to rest.



H̸̡̼͚̰̫̹̒͆̀̊̇̈̍̃̔͛́͝Ȩ̴̦̺͎̲̻̘͍͉̤͔̭̦̫̌̃̿͛́͊͑̔̅͠ ̸̜͎͚̬͉̈́̈́̀̃̉̉̃́̈́̒͐̏̊̚͝ň̶̥̦̥̱̝̝̺̃̊̓͌̐͋̃̅̀̽̀̕̕e̸̦̞͈̤̪̤͚̺̦̱̜̅͐́͒̑̓͋̍̐ë̶̡̛͈̭̫̙̩̮̯̪̥͎͇̣͍̬́̾̓̂͆̓̽́͗̏̍͛̚͠ḑ̸̗̬̭̱̭͔̫̼̣̆̓͌̏͐̔̓͋̚ș̴͖̖̤͓̻̝̬͈̓ ̴̧̡̰̪̰̹̞̠͙͚̲̥͉͈̮̂̀͂̿̒y̷͕͈͖̆̆̽͊͜o̴̦̱̣͕͛̅̾̓̑͌͌̌̍̽̀̀͋͘͜͠ǘ̸͔͚͖̺̰̝͙̯̗̱̜̏̍̈̈́͐͑͘̚͝͝r̵̨̭͎͒̒̈́͘ͅ ̸͖͉̺͈̥̱͉̪̋͌͆͌̈̋̽̉͋́͒̕h̶̛̗̰̹̋͛̐̓̔̚͝e̵̡͙̭̖̹͑̌̅̌̊͌͂̒̉͒̒͂̓͝͝l̷͈̅́́́p̴̹͕̻̙̼̪̘̲̜̍̋̄͊̀


Features
  • Play through plenty of unique and beautiful levels.
  • Unlock dozens of upgrades for multiple different vehicles and crafts.
  • Discover plenty of secrets and collectibles along your journey.
  • Complete quests and side missions for bonus rewards.
  • Enjoy the relaxing atmosphere as you push ever forwards towards your goals.
  • Uncover the world of memories you've cherished with your loved one.
  • S̸̖̺̦̰̗͔̈́̆̿́̏͊͋̅͒͜ͅụ̸̘̮̩̱̼͓̦̆̾̅͑͝͝͝ṃ̴̆̈́́̉̽̋̍m̴̢̬͙̳͕̦͙̍̈́̈́o̸̦̻̣̺̹͗͋̑n̴̼͌̆͑̔̇̚͝ ̶̢̗̮̖̖̅́̄̓̀̈́̔͒t̵̬̯͚͓̮̽h̶̹̪̜̠̪̞̗̆̎͘ë̴̢͚͓͔̯́̍̀̓͜ ̵̛̙͍̼̦͈͉̭̺͗̚͝-̵̧̧̠̹͕̹̫̖̼͋͘͝ ̸̤̣̦̐̂̌̈́̄̔Ȅ̴̘̟̼̗̙͌͌R̵̦̲̻͚̗̭͓̒ͅŖ̵̺͎̓̚͜Ǫ̷̰́ͅR̵̮̣̰̤̭͍̖̪͔̃̈̄
  • FATAL ERROR Return 2

data.short_description: Build and upgrade paper planes to celebrate the memories of your lost brother to help with your grief. In this launcher game you will have different crafts and locations to re-live the best memories to help let him go. D̶̰̕ô̵̮n̶͎͘'̷̙̂t̴͕̚ ̵̤͂ḷ̵͛e̷̘͝t̷̙̕ ̷̼̈h̶̞̆ï̸̯m̶̖͠ ̵̘̔g̸̻̾ő̸̗

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game may present content and ideas that may be considered mature. The themes may allude to self harm and psychological torture.
